#  BOT Strip Show
<!--
@name:  BOT Strip Show
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Sets the color(s) of all LEDs on the LED strip or ring connected to the specified port.
## Parameters

- **colors&dollar;**: A string indicating the color(s) of the LEDs, set in the "color1 color2 color3 color4 color5..." mode, with one space between any two colors.
- **port**: The number of the port where the strip is connected, 1, 2, or 0 for all ports
---
<p align="center"><img valign="middle" width="76px" src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/en/image001.png" /></p>
